ComicInfo.Summary:
Bound concludes as Gord faces his inner demons and Becky struggles inside her prison of salvation. Gord Cantrell is at a crossroads for personal gain, or the protection of the known world. Becky will dig deeper into the mysteries and powers of the Generals gun in an attempt to look for the missing Drake Sinclair.
